Überlingen is a city in the south of

railway and bus network. There are also ferries operating from other cities bordering Lake Constance. There is only a bus connection linking Meersburg and Überlingen. There is a bicycle circuit the entire way around Lake Constance, passing through Überlingen.
There are a few bus and train services through Überlingen, but much of Überlingen is walkable, particularly along the lakeside. Bicycles are also an excellent form of transport.
Visit the city park on the north west corner of the town centre to view the 'witches house' and enjoy the lookout over the town and lake.
Many Greek restaurants such as Mykonos have local seafood available. There are also some Italian restaurants and German restaurants all along the lake side for al fresco dining.
